summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Victoria Avenue from the south line of Lot 1, Block 66, West Seattle Land & Improvement Company's 3rd Plat to a point 141 feet more or less, south of West Holgate Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 114590 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of " Payment in Bonds".
